name: Asesino
description:
'''Asesino''' (Spanish for "assassin" or "murderer") is an American [[deathgrind]] [[supergroup (music)|supergroup]] and a side project of [[Fear Factory]] guitarist [[Dino Cazares]]. The band has featured members of [[Brujeria (band)|Brujeria]], [[Fear Factory]], [[Sepultura]], [[Sadistic Intent]], [[Possessed (band)|Possessed]], [[Ministry (band)|Ministry]], and [[Static-X]].

Asesino sometimes play [[Slayer]] covers live, most notably "[[Angel of Death (Slayer song)|Angel of Death]]" and "[[Raining Blood]]". As with [[Brujeria (band)|Brujeria]], the lyrics are sung entirely in Spanish and with the same subject matter of death, violence and perversion. Guitarist Asesino describes the band as "the new Brujeria." Asesino also has the tendency of making satirical comments during the show, and when playing [[Brujeria (band)|Brujeria]] songs, change the original lyrics to something more fitting.

Asesino made a guest appearance as a couple of Mexican doctors in [[Metalocalypse (season 4)|episode 57]] of ''[[Metalocalypse]]'' on [[Adult Swim]], with Campos voicing Dr. Sepultura and Cazares and MÃ¡rquez voicing his assistant.
